html:
Etymology[edit]

From scrībō (“write”) +‎ -titō (frequentative suffix)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Classical) IPA(key): /ˈskriːp.ti.toː/, [ˈskriːp.t̪ɪ.t̪oː]
  • (Ecclesiastical) IPA(key): /ˈskrip.ti.to/, [ˈskrip.t̪i.t̪ɔ]

Verb[edit]

scrīptitō (present infinitive scrīptitāre, perfect active scrīptitāvī, supine scrīptitātum); first conjugation

  1. I write (often)

Conjugation[edit]
